dt-option.name: maxDate
dt-option.summary: Set the max date that can be selected and displayed

type.description: When this option is null there is no max date imposed by DateTime.
This option can also be a string. If this is the case it must be able to be taken by the Date constructor as an argument to create a Date instance to represent the `maxDate`.
This option can also be a directly given a Date, saving DateTime from creating one from a string.

dt-option.default: As default, no maxDate is applied to DateTime instances.

example.title: Set maxDate to the end of 2029 using a string
Set maxDate to the end of 2029 using a Date
